item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, September 27, 2024 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. It's hard to write code for computers, but it's harder to write code for humans (57 points | 21 comments)
2. TSMC execs allegedly dismissed OpenAI CEO Sam Altman as 'podcasting bro' (132 points | 79 comments)
3. Legalizing Sports Gambling Was a Mistake (573 points | 526 comments)
4. End of an era: Landsat 7 mission takes final images (224 points | 39 comments)
5. I Am Tired of AI (401 points | 409 comments)
6. I have 2000 old VHS tapes in my garage and don't know what to do with them (258 points | 223 comments)
7. CouchDB 3.4.1 Released (7 points | discuss)
8. Hacking Kia: Remotely controlling cars with just a license plate (487 points | 296 comments)
9. Two kinds of LLM responses: Informational vs. Instructional (40 points | 6 comments)
10. Small3dlib: Suckless PD 3D software rasterizer (196 points | 74 comments)
11. 1000s of Toxins from food packaging found in humans – research (15 points | discuss)
12. Vanilla OS 2: an immutable distribution to run all software (124 points | 36 comments)
13. A pilot project in universal algebra to explore new ways to collaborate (159 points | 18 comments)
14. Why are my ZFS disks so noisy? (112 points | 25 comments)
15. Imbue (YC S17) Is Hiring a Founding Product Engineer ( | hide)
16. BookStack: Simple and Free Wiki Software (57 points | 8 comments)
17. FCC unlocks spectrum to support advanced satellite services (118 points | 57 comments)
18. Sony, Ubisoft scandals lead to California ban on deceptive digital goods sales (209 points | 65 comments)
19. NKRYPT Sculpture (237 points | 8 comments)
20. Implementing and Detecting Anti-Debugging with Fork() (31 points | 10 comments)
21. The ambition of Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 (127 points | 91 comments)
22. In the Shack with Robert Caro (19 points | 13 comments)
23. I've tracked every piece of clothing I've worn for three years (2021) (111 points | 153 comments)
24. Attacking UNIX Systems via CUPS (375 points | 273 comments)
25. Dethrace: Reverse engineering the 1997 game "Carmageddon" (2023) (81 points | 26 comments)
26. Nardwuar on his best and worst interviews (108 points | 33 comments)
27. Stem cells reverse woman’s diabetes (241 points | 34 comments)
28. Tcl 9.0 (359 points | 181 comments)
29. Malicious SHA-1 (2014) (61 points | 9 comments)
30. WordPress.org bans WP Engine (505 points | 419 comments)
